job.title: REMOTE Software Developer (Open Pages)
job.description:
Additional Job Details: 

  • 10-12 years’ work experience. 
  • 6 - 8 years Open Pages required. Certified Preferred. ---Using Version 8.02, but if someone has 7.9 experience and above would be great. 
  • Workflows, AFCON, AURA experience. 
  • Must be comfortable and this person will play a lead role to assist with other employees. 
  • SDLC process and working with QA automation. 
  • Someone with financial experience would be beneficial. 
  • Provide OpenPages development (Trigger/Helper, Workflow, BPM, module configuration and customization). 
  • Provide development support to the management of GRC related projects and scheduled releases. 
  • Troubleshooting of reported issues related to developed/configured solutions. 
  • Work with IT and business leads to understand and build development requirements and similar business analysis tasks. 
  • Advise on possible impacts and outcomes of changes made to the IBM OpenPages solution 
  • Ensure coordination between the Product owner and tech organizations. 
  • Knowledge of various QA techniques/automation Tools, Defect management and prioritization .
